resources.string: 选择会话列表与新信息切换方式
勾选启用快速回复灰暗主题（仅 Jellybean）
您是否确认想要删除此短信？
您是否确认想要删除这些短信？
更改主题设置后，您必须重启程序以应用设置
选择标题栏颜色（同样适用于黑色主题）
当收到新短信时将自动显示快速回复窗口
在短信信息中使用“?”代替不支持的字符
设置初始载入短信数量
限制初始短信载入数量
将信息保存至收件箱、中断其他短信应用广播并阻止通知显示，仅当您已卸载原生短信时启用
当应用启动时候自动滑出左侧列表
设置初始会话载入数量
发信人以及信息文本不显示在通知内
在快速回复对话框底部显示会话预览按键
当搜索时仅显示信息发送号码
选择 LED 指示灯显示颜色
设置收到新短信时的震动模式
在键盘中显示表情按键
当收到新短信时候唤醒屏幕
当收到新短信时候解锁设备
当打开新会话时完全闭合短信会话列表
禁用左右滑动菜单并更改为仅通过顶部按键打开
当应用启动时候自动显示键盘
勾选后标题栏将使用大写字母显示
在操作栏中显示当前会话联系人头像
设置滑动菜单自定义背景
设置短信会话自定义背景
警告：此操作将删除所有短信会话！\n\n您是否确认想要继续操作？
发送接收信息文本字体颜色
设置接收信息文本字体颜色
设置菜单文本字体颜色
设置信息透明度（允许显示自定义背景）
在您的锁屏界面中显示新信息
感谢 jfeinstein10 创建于 GitHub 的 SlidingMenu 库以及所有翻译者
勾选该选项始终检查新信息数量，即使数量为零
动作栏显示联系人信息
强制显示联系人信息于自动栏中，即使标题栏已启用显示
选择发送信息后所显示的动画
选择接收信息后所显示的动画
选择联系人姓名文本显示颜色
创建允许您直接发送信息至联系人的通知
点击打开快速信息窗口
测试功能：帮助加快初次启动速度，但可能导致过多电耗
若您只希望 Sliding Messaging 运行，请勾选“代替原生短信”选项。若您发现勾选后导致 Sliding Messaging 强制关闭，您只需要卸载 Sliding Messaging 并重新安装即可。
正在缓存数据（缓存使用时间取决于您信息的数量）
您可以在此获取主题编辑器：
- 您有以下两种方式编辑当前主题：
1) 选择一个预设主题，在其基础上修改（您可以通过菜单 -> 编辑主题编辑该预设主题）
2) 进入菜单 -> 新建主题以创建一个新的主题并编辑该主题
- 删除选项将删除当前处于预览状态的主题（限非默认主题）
- 若想获取全新更多主题，您可进入菜单 -> 获取更多主题
- 设置字体可（应用于所有主题）进入菜单 -> 自定义字体
请注意：若您选择了前几三个之外的主题（亮色、暗色以及深黑色），那么您这些主题将被您所设置的新主题覆盖
Pro 版用户可直接使用任何下载的主题，但是若您需要编辑主题，那么您必须下载 Theme Engine 才可继续操作
选择应用内显示文本字体
正在查找 SD 卡中的字体文件…

Sliding Messaging 现已支持完全自由定制使用主题！
\功能简介：
 - 拥有 16 款不同的主题可供选择
 - 选取任意颜色或使用 holo 预设
 - 编辑大量以往尚未主体化的元素
 - 在线分享获取他人设计全新主题
 - 从设备外部存储选择自定义字体

进入设置 -> 自定义主题设置 -> 菜单 -> 帮助信息可获取更多关于全新的主题编辑器相关信息。
请注意，如果您遇到了启动速度过慢等问题，请尝试在设置中勾选“保留后台服务”选项\n\n与以往一样，Sliding Messaging 仍处于 Beta 阶段，所有功能都在不断改变以及优化 - 随着 Android 的不断发展。
启用该选项后通知图标将在通知栏中使用渐变效果显示，仅可用于白色图标
Sliding Messaging 发现您已安装了 GO 短信。需注意的是 Go SMS 默认将拦截其他短信通知，这意味着您可能不会收到任何由 Sliding Messaging 发出的通知。您可以进入 GO 短信设置 -> 高级设置 -> 接收设置中取消勾选“屏蔽其他东西应用通知”。
建议您禁用联系人图片选项，否则用户界面可能出现错误，除非您使用 Android 4.2 及更高版本
可自动将发送给多位联系人的信息转换为彩信群发信息，建议 Android 4.2 及更高版本
将长文本信息作为彩信发送
将超出字符显示的长信息转为彩信发送
当文本长度超过规定时转为彩信发送
主题状态和收件人状态不符
您的 APN 设置可能出现了错误，您尚未重新配置这些信息。可能是它们由于某种原因导致不兼容或您连接至了 Wi-Fi 网络。\n\n由于 Google 在 Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) 所做的限制，
由于 Google 考虑到安全因素，限制了 Sliding Messaging 访问系统定义的 APN 信息。正因如此，您现在需要手动设置其信息如果您希望
通过 Sliding Messaging 发送彩信，您需要了解您运营商的 APN 信息 并进入系统设置 -> 无线和网络 -> 更多 -> 移动网络 -> 接入点
名称并选择您当前可以正常使用的 APN 设置，复制“彩信中心”、“彩信代理”以及“彩信端口”项所填写的信息，并进入 Sliding Messaging
彩信设置，将其信息粘贴至文本框中。您可以通过主菜单或下方按钮进入。您可以通过 Google 快速搜索您运营商的设置信息并填写完整。\n\n
在您正确填写这些信息前您可能无法正常发送彩信
在 Dashclock 微件中隐藏发信者姓名
代替之前锁设置的震动模式
每个数字需使用逗号或空格来分隔，例如：“0, 400, 100, 400”。振动模式将按照您所设置的震动时长间隔交替开启以及通知震动
Sliding Messaging 有一款功能具有更多功能的 Pro 版本可供使用！Pro 版包括以下功能：\n

- 可以发送并浏览彩信以及其分组信息
- 使用分享对话框分享网络连接等信息
- 六种可替换全新定制主题可供您选取

- 可选择会话菜单及信息列表背景图像
- 可自定义信息文本使用字体以及颜色
- 自定义发送以及接收短信时显示电话
- 以及更多重量级功能等您发现！
Pro 用户同时还可以获取更频繁的更新以及体验最新功能！
如果您在发送彩信时出现了错误，最可能出现的问题就是您所输入的 APN 信息不正确导致或您正处于 Wi-Fi 中导致设备无法连接。
请将您可以正常使用的 APN 以及运营商名称发送至 jklinker1@gmail.com ，以便我添加此 APN 信息至预置列表中
自定义用户名以及密码
部分运营商可能需要填写用户名以及密码才能正常收发彩信，如果是此类运营商提供您的网络服务，那么请您正确填写此项值
APN 用户名，该项值可能为空
APN 密码，该项值可能为空
获取 APN 信息帮助
可能可以使用也可能无法使用，也可能需要手动修改
从列表预设 APN 中选择您的运营商进行快速设置
启用或禁用信息列表顶部联系人卡片显示
启用或禁用会话列表联系人卡片呼叫按钮
动作栏显示联系人姓名
绘制无下部阴影卡片并有助于提升性能
Quickly fling from the left side of screen to open conversation list
Quickly fling from the right side of screen to compose a new message
Distance from side of screen you must start your fling from to activate gesture (by % of screen space)
To activate these gestures, start a quick swipe on the side of your screen toward the middle. To quickly move between pages, start your swipe in the middle and move toward either side.
Represents the distance you must move your finger from start to end to activate fling
Represents the speed you must move your finger to activate fling
Select how often you want to be reminded of a new message
Workaround: Will temporaraly disable WiFi when sending MMS and then attempt to restore connection once complete.
Hides the phone number of each contact in the conversation list
Shows the keyboard when the popup is on screen automatically
Add more quick templates in Settings -> Manage Quick Templates
Message will be sent with the return key instead of adding a return
For use with custom ROMs with multiwindow (HALO) functionality only. Will launch full app in multiwindow mode instead of just the popup when notification received
Choose flashing LED color. Be aware your LED may not support all colors
Displays date as a tiny font size instead of slightly smaller then message text size
Hide notifications but still save messages from this contact
Hide notifications and don\'t save messages from this contact
Saves some data such as individual notifications and blacklist settings to the external SD card instead of internally
Will split messages into compatible lengths. For use if you have trouble sending long messages with your carrier
Will move action bar to top of screen on card layout
Loads 15 conversations on app startup instead of all to decrease load time

Compresses Images to be sent more easily over your mobile data connection. If disabled, pictures will be sent at higher resolutions. Please be aware many carriers do not support sending at higher resolutions and you may get errors.
Sends MMS messages through the stock messaging app, useful if you have problems configuring Sliding Messaging to send
The test notification will be shown when you turn off the screen.

If you are having problems with messages not being saved, or you have disabled all other messaging apps on your device except Sliding Messaging, be sure to check the \"Override Stock Messaging\" option in Advanced Settings.
Only applicable when using the new popup
Check to enable security at startup.
Length of time between password lockouts
Attempt to automatically unlock the app after the set number of characters has been reached.
Follow the app on Twitter for updates and future innovations! \nhttp://www.twitter.com/SlidingSMS
This will override all previous backups.
Does not allow Sliding Messaging to save MMS messages, allowing your stock app to do so instead, even if you have checked the \"Override Stock Messaging\" option.
Will automatically insert draft into message entry box if present. If disabled, you will get a popup box to choose whether or not to insert each draft
Will play sound when message has sent
Caches conversations in the background to allow for faster loading times, has potential to affect battery life. This feature is still experimental. UPDATE: Disabled for now, caused too many crashes
Sets the number of conversations to be cached and quickly loaded at application startup and in the background

PLEASE READ: Enabling this will greatly increase the speed of Sliding Messaging, it will also backup all your SMS messages to an external service for safekeeping and delete them from the SMS database. You will not be able to see these messages in Sliding Messaging or any other messaging app.
WARNING: May backup and delete unread messages if scheduled before they are seen.
Keep the last day in the manifest so that you have only those messages after the backup and delete

RECOMMENDED: this will delete all messages after backup is complete to increase speed and fluidity of Sliding Messaging.\nWARNING: it will also delete MMS which are not backed up through this utility.
Will display a small notification bar at the top of the screen when a new message has been received
Please select carrier from the drop-down menu or configure APN settings manually.
Loads only 10 conversations at app startup for speed purposes
Choose when the conversation list should stay on the screen instead of being hidden in the drawer
Adds a counter in front of split messages to keep them in correct order. Example: (1/3)
Replaces popup with a fully functioning version of the app that shows as a dialog box over other apps instead of taking the entire screen
More on this for another update... ;)
Creates a chathead bubble that will allow you to quickly open and close the app on top of any other app
Move SlideOver to the left or right side of the screen
Adjust where SlideOver appears on the vertical axis
Adjust how much of the SlideOver bubble is visible on the screen
Distance on screen that you have to pull to activate SlideOver
Adjust how big the conversation arc is on the screen
SlideOver is still heavily under development. Do not submit requests, or even suggestions, for it at this time.
Choose the action that occurs when you have activated the dashed part of the SlideOver arc
Closes the popup after you have replied to a message
Adjusts the size of the SlideOver popup on screen. Useful if when keyboard is showing your messages get cut off due to lack of space, or if you don\'t want it to take up too much of your screen
Only show the popup when you have unlocked the device and there is a new message, otherwise let the SlideOver bubble handle new messages
Override some custom app settings for the most optimized/quickest behavior
Please check the new section under setting \'Developer Tips\' for speed and MMS issues before leaving a bad review or sending us an angry email. It should be able to solve some of your problems.

With the latest update, we have made a few great strides toward a completely lag free app. But obviously this is a difficult task because of the style and what we are trying to do with the app. It is very memory intensive and uses a lot of resources to load so many messages at once. Many more than any other messaging app has to do. That is why it can be a little more sluggish than most if you have a ton of messages.


As for my speed tip, you have 2 options really. Both are compromises, but that is what you are gonna have to deal with in an app like this:


1.) DELETE MESSAGES! This is what we have been preaching since the beginning. IT WILL HELP YOU :) this is my first suggestion.


I understand that some people may not want to do this though, because they like to keep them for their records. There are backup solutions out there for this purpose. Use them. Deleting messages makes a huge difference if you have a ton of them. For reference, the app works flawlessly, zero lag, on my nexus 4 with around 2000 messages that I have now. I can't test more than that right now obviously, but if you are someone that keeps 10000 on your phone or some ungodly amount like this, obviously this is going to have a severely negative effect with our app.


Like i said, this is my first suggestion to everyone.


2.) Check the "override for performance" option under advanced settings and set your theme to cards 2.0.


This is more of a workaround, but it is, from my experience, a set of default settings that are the most optimized and work the best on any phone. It does take away some of the customization. But your themes and stuff, for the most part, will work. I just took out some of the extra, unnecessary things. This option is a compromise. If you aren't willing to clear out your inbox, try it out. It will work better, I know this for a fact, but it will also take away some of your settings, know that.


I honestly don't want to hear about lag or stuttering that much any more. We have given you the tools to fix it. If you choose not to use them, then so be it. But they are there and that is how this is gonna work :)

This tip is definitely more of a workaround, but I am tired of people telling us that they can't get MMS to download. Sending is a whole 'nother issue, but downloading will work on every phone, every time, if you know how to set it up.


I have emailed this out so many times that I think it is just time to put it in here for everyone to see.


So here is how you should set up downloading MMS messages:


1.) check the receive through stock option.


This option makes it so that it doesn't matter what other settings you have, your message will use the stock apps services to download. It doesn't matter if you have override stock checked or not. This lets the stock app handle all downloads so you don't have to worry about APN's or a WiFi fix that so many people hate us for.


2.) In the stock messaging app, check the auto download option.


This is just what it sounds, it will automatically download your messages for you when the carrier receives them. It isn't slower than having to push the download button, and there really are no downsides to this.


3.) Un-check the auto-download button in Sliding Messaging


This will make sure that you aren't getting double notifications.


So there you go, this is really the best way to handle downloading MMS and it will work flawlessly every time, just like the stock one should. It will still throw the Sliding Messaging notification as well, so no problems there.


EVERYTHING WILL WORK HOW IT SHOULD, EVERY TIME


So now we will have no more problems with downloading MMS! :)

Settings Overview (be aware some of these are only accessible by checking the "Show All Settings" option in advanced settings):


1) Horizontal Positioning determines whether the bubble is on the right or left of the screen
 2) Vertical Positioning sets how far from the top of the screen the bubble is
 3) Sliver Widths changes the amount of bubble you see, lower the sliver width, the less you will see on the edge of the screen
 4) Activation Width is the percent of the screen that the arc covers to activate the popup
 5) Arc Break Point will adjust the length of the dashed line on the bottom half of the arc
 6) Secondary action lets you select what happens when you are in the dashed area, either opening to the conversation list or creating a new message
 7) Enable haptic feedback, that one is self explanatory. vibrate on or off
 8) Auto-close SlideOver will close it when you have replied to a new message, very convenient for exiting quickly and getting back to what you were doing
 9) SlideOver Side changes the padding on the top and bottom of the popup window, making it smaller or much larger. Be careful of setting values to small though, then it wont show at all



Now, as for the main features of SlideOver:


1) There is the new popup which everyone can take advantage of to see an entire conversation when a new message comes in, MMS support for that conversation, etc. Lots better than the old popups
 2) The bubble allows you a "chatheads", yet extremely minimal interface, which you can allows use to pull up the app from anywhere at any time, whether or not you have new messages or just want to compose a new one
 3) When you do have new messages, you can quickly see a preview of each message and depending on how far you slide your finger from the bubble, it will highlight a different conversation which will then allow you to quickly access that conversation. That way, you can allows quickly tell how many new messages you have and decide which you actually want to respond to first, or at all
 4) There are 3 buttons at the top of the window when SlideOver has been activated and the arc is shown on screen to easily allow you to clear all of the notifications, close slideover all together and get the bubble out of the way, or go to settings to move it around or whatever you want to do with it

I get a lot of questions as to "why I can't see my contact pictures" or "some of my contacts don't show up in the app?!"


There is good reason for this, it is because we only pull pictures and contacts from your google account. The reason behind this is 1) it is easier for us, and 2) it is quicker because we only have one place to look for pictures, decreasing loading times.

As for the solution, there are many apps out there that will accomplish this task for you quickly and easily. I recommend:


1.) Haxsync


2.) Contact Picture Sync


3.) Ubersync


All these programs work well and will get you the contact pictures that you want so dearly :)
Use only SlideOver to handle notifications, hiding them from the status bar

I've had multiple requests to take advantage of the new APIs introduced in Android 4.3 that allow for listening to when notifications are posted and dismissed and taking advantage of that for marking a message as read.


Any users who is on Android 4.3 can now do this by going into their system settings, security, and clicking the "Notification Access" option (or simply by clicking on this tip).


You will then be taken to a list of all apps which have added this ability and simply enable Sliding Messaging with the check box. From now on, whenever you swipe away the notification it will mark your message as read, eliminating the need for the "Read" button on the notification!

Thanks for purchasing Sliding Messaging Pro!\n\n
It may seem like there is a lot going on at first, but lets walk you though some initial setup, then you will be able to configure everything else on your own from the settings menu.
